EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly - NCR Mobile Pay Now in General Release!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 11, 2020 NCR Mobile Pay Now in General Release! We are pleased to announce the general availability of our NCR Mobile Pay solution. Mobile pay is now implemented in nearly 850 sites. In August alone, NCR Mobile Pay processed 191,188 unique payments, totaling $11,471,280.
Customers can now enjoy the many benefits of NCR Mobile Pay, such as convenient contactless payments that give customers peace of mind, increased table turns, and it helps improve employee satisfaction. For access to recent NCR Mobile Pay sales materials, demo scripts, and videos, check out the NCR Mobile Pay channel partner Seismic page <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DCZTl5EpNMo06NGApuAq0Pkg]]>.
NCR Mobile Pay Release Notes The latest release notes for NCR Mobile Pay is here <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rbf/ek/va/NCR Mobile Pay Release Notes 9.4.20 - Final.pdf]]>. We’re bringing you more great features in NCR Mobile Pay, such as partial payments, Aloha Stored Value (ASV) integration, and updates to the operator dashboard user interface.
